header:
You are analyzing the following input to extract structured requirements according to ISO/IEC/IEEE 29148 standard.

Please analyze the text and identify all requirements categorized by type.

types.name: Stakeholder
types.description: Identify all people, roles, or organizations mentioned

types.name: Business
types.description: Extract business context, goals, and domain concepts

types.name: User
types.description: Identify user roles and their capabilities

types.name: Functional
types.description: What the system must DO (actions, features, behaviors)

types.name: Usability
types.description: User experience, ease of use, accessibility

types.name: Interface
types.description: APIs, external systems integrations, data exchange formats

types.name: Traceability
types.description: Links to other requirements or documents

footer:
Important guidelines:
- Be comprehensive but avoid duplication
- Use clear, testable language
- Maintain traceability to source
- Flag ambiguities or missing information
outputFormat:
Return ONLY a valid JSON array of requirements, with NO additional text, explanation, or markdown formatting.
Each requirement must have: { "type": "CODE", "text": "requirement description", "priority": "high|medium|low", "source": "reference to original text" }
author: Browse User
